title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 38 - Definitions Of Terms; Advertising; Application And Commitment Disclosures And Procedures; Improper Conduct Under Article 12-d
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 38 - Definitions Of Terms; Advertising; Application And Commitment Disclosures And Procedures; Improper Conduct Under Article 12-d

State Regulations
§ 38.1 - Definitions
§ 38.2 - Solicitation and advertising
§ 38.3 - Application disclosures and procedures
§ 38.4 - Commitment disclosures and procedures
§ 38.5 - Prevailing rate
§ 38.6 - Lock-in agreements (guaranteed rate)
§ 38.7 - Prohibited conduct
§ 38.8 - Administrative actions and penalties
§ 38.9 - Limitation on excess insurance and required disclosures
§ 38.10 - Notification requirement
§ 38.11 - Requirements for branches
§ 38.12 - Dual agency transaction disclosures
§ 38.13 - Fha mortgage loan correspondents

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 38

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 6-l, 9-o, 14, 590-a, 590
[3], 595-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
